import React from 'react'; const About: React.FC = () => { return (

About Me

Introduction

Hi, I’m Richard K, a passionate data professional with over five years of experience in the industry. My career is rooted in transforming complex data into actionable insights, helping organizations optimize their operations, drive growth, and make data-driven decisions.

I specialize in areas such as data analysis, machine learning, and predictive modeling, leveraging these skills to solve real-world problems in sectors like telecommunications, finance, and security.

Outside of work, I enjoy mentoring upcoming data professionals and contributing to the global conversation on data science through presentations and publications. I’m also passionate about continuing education, particularly in artificial intelligence and machine learning.

Professional Journey

Financial (AML) Analyst

Dec 2021 - Present | Financial Reporting Centre, Nairobi

  • Developed risk-based monitoring systems, ensuring adherence to AML laws and regulations and improvement in risk mitigation measures.
  • Employed information extraction techniques and advanced analytics, including anomaly detection, for identifying and investigating suspicious activities, reducing the time taken to review and assign reports to analysts.
  • Actively monitored accounts to detect suspicious activity, leading necessary analyses and investigations.
  • Created automated processes using predictive models for monitoring and detecting unusual patterns, enhancing risk management efficiency.
  • Authored and revised AML policies and guidelines, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.
  • Developed AML/CFT policies and guidelines in line with financial services offered by different Reporting Entities such as banks, accounting firms, and fintechs, leading to a 37% increase in registered entities with the Centre.
  • Analyzed data meticulously to pinpoint and scrutinize high-risk suspicious reports and transactions.
  • Conducted procurement fraud identification and support document verification.
  • Promoted change management for the adoption of new technologies for risk management and anomaly (fraud) detection.
  • Introduced natural language processing into the analysis process, essential for handling complex text data.
  • Experienced in tax evasion detection, comprehensive reporting, and financial record analysis.
  • Developed dashboards using Power BI for monitoring performance indicators.

Analyst

Jan 2020 - Nov 2021 | Milago Human Resource Company, Nairobi

  • Worked collaboratively with various teams to resolve data issues, achieving a significant 13% increase in data accuracy.
  • Undertook ad-hoc operational analysis to address specific business queries, delivering insights that enhanced operational efficiency and led to cost savings.
  • Analyzed and visualized extensive network-related datasets, uncovering vital insights and contributing to a 6% rise in actionable reports for the company.

Data Analyst – Operations

Aug 2019 - Dec 2019 | Ahadi Wireless, Nairobi

  • Conducted a comprehensive survey in Githurai 44 to estimate household numbers and evaluate building conditions, utilizing data analysis and interpretation.
  • Analyzed the collected data to provide actionable insights aimed at introducing affordable internet services to the community, showcasing data mining and analysis skills.
  • Utilized Power BI for data visualization and presented findings to stakeholders, demonstrating proficiency in data presentation and communication.
  • Executed geo-spatial analysis to gain a deeper understanding of the area’s demographics and infrastructure, reflecting skills in handling large datasets and complex data interpretation.

Engineering Operations Intern

May 2019 - Jul 2019 | Ahadi Wireless, Nairobi

  • Developed a system for managing equipment and tool inventory, enhancing asset tracking and reducing operational delays.
  • Contributed to setting up the company's first wireless network infrastructure, laying the groundwork for essential operational connectivity. This played a pivotal role in advancing to a Data Analyst position.
  • Ensured smooth internet connectivity, managing online operations and prompt resolution of connectivity issues.

Education & Certifications

  • Master of Science in Data Science and Analytics - Strathmore University
  • Bachelor of Science in Industrial Mathematics - Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology
  • Certificate in Data Science - Moringa School
); }; export default About;
